heading.title: Welcome to <nbsp>Axé DAO</nbsp>
heading.subtitle: A digital organization for the Capoeira Community

introduction.p1: We are Capoeiristas from different schools and different corners of the world who want to give back to Capoeira by creating open and community-owned digital tools for the benefit of all of Capoeira.
introduction.p2: We value autonomy, freedom, and self-determination and apply these to the digital world to create shared apps and platforms for the Capoeira subculture and its ecosystem.
introduction.p3: Axé DAO is a pioneering effort by Capoeiristas for Capoeiristas to coordinate collective actions that help grow the Capoeira ecosystem and support those who live and breathe this art form.

content.p1: In today's digital and online world, Capoeira groups are scattered across many websites and free social and messaging platforms. There is no easy way to understand how many groups even exist across the globe.
content.p2: A digital platform for Capoeira that is community-owned and governed democratically enables global collaboration for anyone who loves and wants to contribute to this art form. Imagine a space where every member of the Capoeira community has a voice in decision-making and together we build a platform that is truly ours.
content.p3: Our mission at Axé DAO is to serve and benefit the Capoeira community through digital tools. The first app being created is a registry specific for Capoeira groups and individuals to populate the genealogy tree of Capoeira.

content.p1: DAO stands for Digital Autonomous Organization. It is our model of governance that facilitates transparent, equitable decision-making processes among its members to collectively hold funds and decide how to use them.
content.p2: In the beginning, our primary objective is to create digital tools for Capoeira such as an open-source app, digital identity, and a registry. Long-term, we want to fund individual Capoeira projects and events and direct financial support into the community where it's needed.

content.p1:
We want to support, preserve, and enrich the practice of Capoeira and in 2024 we plan to:

  • Launch a digital identity app for the Capoeira community
  • Open a registry for groups and individuals to start creating the social graph and lineage tree of Capoeira groups worldwide
  • Decide on the launch of the Axé token and its fair distribution parameters
content.p2:
On a longer time-scale our goals are:

  • Create functionality for Capoeira groups to access digital assets like NFTs that can be used for badges, digital art, memberships, etc.
  • Explore reducing costs for Capoeira groups by offering common services, e.g. for event scheduling, group management, membership fees, etc.
  • Explore the creation of a circular digital economy to sustain Capoeira in general and its community members into the future.
